info.brief_description: A little rabbit and her mother are about to see things from a whole new perspective!
info.description:
Yes, this is another transformation-related interactive involving ladies from the Sonicverse. but this one's unique in that it features the most underrated female(IMO), Vanilla the Rabbit!

Here's my guidelines, which I hope you'll at least try to follow:

-Try to keep it non-violent. Vanilla and Cream are both kind and gentle. It's going to take more than a change of scale to turn either of them into a cold-blooded, sadistic killer.

-Other characters can join in, but keep the focus on Cream and/or Vanilla.

-Sexual content is fine...for Vanilla.

-Bigger/smaller isn't always better. I've seen too many of these stories write themelves into corners because the subjects go straight to thousands of feet tall or nearly microscopic. Less extreme sizes often have more creative potential.

-Offering choices is always good, but let's try to keep this from being one of those interactives where every choice leads to more "more choices" chapters, mmkay?

And with that out of the way, on with the show!
